howto.title: How to
howto.ingress0: Tab the upper left area of the screen.
howto.ingress1: Tab the upper right icon and copy your agent status into clip board.
howto.ingress2: Read the term of use and click confirm if you agree.
howto.ingress3: Long tap here in the tool and select paste.
howto.ingress4: Click the register button to submit your start record. Once you complete the activity, you need to repeat the same operation to record your end record.
